statements: SELECT * FROM refugee_shelter_inventory;
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM refugee_shelter_inventory WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT location, item_name, quantity FROM refugee_shelter_inventory ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT * FROM refugee_shelter_inventory WHERE item_name LIKE '%blankets%';
SELECT location, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM refugee_shelter_inventory GROUP BY location;
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM refugee_shelter_inventory WHERE location='Camp A';
SELECT * FROM refugee_shelter_inventory WHERE item_id BETWEEN 100 AND 200;
SELECT item_name, location FROM refugee_shelter_inventory ORDER BY location ASC, item_name DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_items FROM refugee_shelter_inventory;
SELECT DISTINCT location FROM refugee_shelter_inventory;
SELECT * FROM Inventory;
SELECT inventory_name, quantity, location FROM Inventory WHERE category='Electronics';
SELECT supply_name, supplier FROM Supplies WHERE quantity > 100;
SELECT * FROM Inventory ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM Supplies WHERE expiration_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Inventory ORDER BY quantity ASC, inventory_name DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT inventory_name, category, location FROM Inventory WHERE category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY inventory_name ASC;
SELECT supply_name, supplier, quantity, expiration_date FROM Supplies ORDER BY expiration_date DESC, supplier ASC;
SELECT inventory_name, category, quantity, location FROM Inventory WHERE quantity > 100 AND location LIKE '%Room%' ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT inventory_name, location FROM Inventory WHERE quantity < 50 ORDER BY inventory_name DESC
SELECT * FROM Inventory;
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM Inventory WHERE location = 'Warehouse';
SELECT supplier_name, phone_number FROM Suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name DESC;
SELECT shelter_name, capacity, location FROM Shelters WHERE capacity > 50;
SELECT item_id, item_name, quantity FROM Inventory WHERE quantity < 10;
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM Inventory WHERE location='Warehouse' ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, phone_number FROM Suppliers WHERE contact_person='John Doe';
SELECT * FROM Shelters WHERE capacity > 50 ORDER BY location ASC, shelter_name DESC;
SELECT item_name, quantity, location FROM Inventory WHERE quantity < 10 OR location IS NULL;
SELECT shelter_name, capacity FROM Shelters WHERE location='City Center' AND capacity >= 100 ORDER BY capacity DESC;
SELECT * FROM Shelter;
SELECT shelter_name, location FROM Shelter WHERE shelter_id = 1;
SELECT supplier_name, phone_number FROM Supplier ORDER BY supplier_id DESC;
SELECT item_name, quantity, unit_price FROM Inventory WHERE quantity > 0 ORDER BY unit_price ASC;
SELECT supplier_name, item_name, quantity_ordered, order_date FROM Supplier s, Supply_Order so WHERE s.supplier_id = so.supplier_id AND order_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT shelter_name, location FROM Shelter;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_person, phone_number FROM Supplier WHERE supplier_id = 1;
SELECT item_name, quantity, unit_price FROM Inventory WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY unit_price DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, item_name, quantity_ordered, order_date FROM Supplier s INNER JOIN Supply_Order so ON s.supplier_id = so.supplier_id INNER JOIN Inventory i ON so.item_id = i.item_id;
SELECT shelter_name AS ShelterName, location AS Location FROM Shelter WHERE location LIKE '%NY%' ORDER BY shelter_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Inventory;
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM Inventory WHERE location = 'Warehouse';
SELECT item_name, location FROM Inventory ORDER BY item_id DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, item_id, transaction_type, quantity_changed, transaction_date FROM Inventory_Transactions WHERE transaction_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT supplier_name, item_name, unit_price FROM Suppliers s JOIN Supplier_Inventory si ON s.supplier_id = si.supplier_id JOIN Inventory i ON si.item_id = i.item_id;
SELECT * FROM Inventory;
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM Inventory WHERE location='Warehouse';
SELECT supplier_name, phone_number FROM Suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name DESC;
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM Inventory WHERE quantity > 50 AND location='Store';
SELECT shelter_name, capacity FROM Shelters WHERE location='City Center' ORDER BY capacity DESC;
